doc:
Billy West (silent film actor) https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Billy_West_(silent_film_actor) 0 Billy West (September 22, 1892 – July 21, 1975) was a film actor, producer and director of the silent film era. He is best known as a Charlie Chaplin impersonator. Billy_West ( September_22_,_1892 – July_21_,_1975 ) was a_film_actor , producer_and_director of the_silent_film_era . He is_best_known as a_Charlie_Chaplin_impersonator .
